body.p: I arrived in Town this forenoon and I have been trying to find your residence But unseccessfullunsuccessful I came to Armory SuqareSquare Hospital to learn whither you had gone The Boys do not know your whereabouts. S
So I concluded to find out by dropping a few lines to you
I hope my Dear Uncle that nothing has befallen you Either sickness or discontentment

I would like to see you before I returnereturn to
The Front which will be on the 18th of this month. To morrow night I will remain here If you have any desire or wish to see me Call or write me your address I just come from the front & Expect to return soon

closer.salute: receive this from one who remembers you still
